nodes.text: The DH-17 short carbine, otherwise known as the DH17 Short Carbine, or DH-17 Snubnose, was a subnosed variant of the DH-17 blaster carbine that was used at the time of the Galactic Civil War.
The DH17 Short Carbine was a weapon in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It could be crafted by players of the munitions trader profession.
